messages.title: EAST BARNET GAS CRISIS UPDATE:
messages.content: East Barnet Conservatives back Council scrutiny report saying compensation should be £100 per day.

housing.content: SUCCESS – GOODWIN COURT RESIDENTS WIN COMPENSATION PAYMENT.

images.caption: Cllr Theresa Villiers, MP and National Grid officials discussing community donation.

leaflet.additionalNotes: East Barnet Conservative Councillors, Cllr Robert Rams and Cllr Joanna Tambourides, and local Conservative Member of Parliament, Theresa Villiers MP, and local campaigner, Barry Evangeli, have welcomed the Council's scrutiny report on the gas problems in East Barnet and have backed the report's calls for compensation at £100 per day. Cllr Robert Rams is coordinating the reception of a donation from National Grid and is seeking input on how it should be spent within the community.
